{{also|Anschluß}} ==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|en|de|Anschluss|t=annexation}} (formerly {{m|de|Anschluß}}), from {{m|de|anschließen|t=to join, unite}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|UK}} {{IPA|en|/ˈan.ʃlʊs/}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|historical}} Political [[annexation]], specifically that of [[Austria]] into [[Nazi Germany]] in 1938. {{defdate|from 1920s}} #* '''1941''', {{w|W Somerset Maugham}}, ''Up at the Villa'', Vintage 2004, page 44: #*: ‘Some of us students protested against the '''Anschluss'''.’ #* '''2001''', {{w|Clive James}}, ''Even As We Speak'': #*: Anton Kuh {{...}} was one of the Viennese coffee-house wits whose mastery of the brief critical essay reached its apotheosis in the last nervous years before the '''''Anschluss'''''. ====Translations==== {{trans-top|the annexation of Austria into Germany in 1938 or an analogy}} * Arabic: {{t|ar|آنْشْلُوس|m|tr=anšlūs}} * Belarusian: {{t|be|а́ншлю́с}} * Bulgarian: {{t|bg|а́ншлус|m}} * Chinese: *: Mandarin: {{t|cmn|德奧合併}}, {{t|cmn|德奥合并|tr=Dé-Ào hébìng}} {{qualifier|specific to Austria}}, {{t+|cmn|合併}}, {{t+|cmn|合并|tr=hébìng}} * Czech: {{t|cs|anšlus|m}} * Danish: {{t|da|anschluss}} * French: {{t|fr|anschluss|m}} * Georgian: {{t|ka|ანშლუსი}} * German: {{t+|de|Anschluss|m}}, {{t+|de|Anschluß|m}} {{qualifier|old spelling}} * Greek: {{t|el|Προσάρτηση της Αυστρίας|f}}, {{t|el|Άνσλους|n}} * Hebrew: {{t|he|אנשלוס}} * Japanese: {{t|ja|アンシュルス|tr=anshurusu}} {{trans-mid}} * Macedonian: {{t|mk|а́ншлус|m}} * Norwegian: *: Bokmål: {{t|nb|anschluss}} * Polish: {{t+|pl|anszlus|m}}, {{t|pl|anschluss|m}} * Portuguese: {{t+|pt|Anschluss|m}} * Russian: {{t+|ru|а́ншлю́с|m}} * Serbo-Croatian: *: Cyrillic: {{t|sh|а̀ншлӯс|m}} *: Roman: {{t+|sh|ànšlūs|m}} * Slovak: {{t|sk|anšlus|m}} * Ukrainian: {{t|uk|а́ншлю́с|m}} {{trans-bottom}} {{topics|en|Historical events|Nazism|Austria}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|Anschluß||superseded}} ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|anschließen}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈanʃlʊs/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Anschluss.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Anschluss.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Anschlusses|Anschlüsse}} #
